title: Linear Combination of Unitaries (LCU)
subtitle: Demonstration of the LCU algorithm for a specific example
description: Implementation of the Linear Combination of Unitaries (LCU) algorithm, which applies a non-unitary matrix A (written as a sum of unitaries with positive coefficients) to a quantum state via a block encoding. The notebook explains the PREPARE-SELECT-PREPARE^{-1} structure and demonstrates it with a concrete example in Classiq.
